alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns County through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over World Golf Village, or 10 miles southeast of Fruit Cove, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Durbin, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee and Guana River State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
